document.full_text: a massive wall-painting depicting a mormon temple in flames along with a catholic monk, police car and a scantily clad woman has sparked a free speech debate in this conservative, heavily mormon salt lake city suburb.
document.title: mural showing mormon temple in flames sparks debate
lines_and_colors: a massive wall-painting depicting a mormon temple in flames along with a catholic monk, police car and a scantily clad woman has sparked a free speech debate in this conservative, heavily mormon salt lake city suburb.
